name: 10 Seconds Or Less
description:
Using the Undo Button Breakes the game Sorry please try not to use it ;3

this is a Small game created for a university project its supposed to be a prototype ;3 

If you notice a bug or issue let us know I do require some feedback on how this works :3 

Apparently, twine does not have a spellchecker so none of this is spelled correctly sorry for the inconvenience.
